name: Around the world in a few seconds
name_original: Around the world in a few seconds
description:
Around the world in few seconds.

A serious game made during The Cultural Heritage Game Jam event.

Goal:

Guide the little guy. Travel the world by discovering fabulous monuments.

Do not collide with the monuments. Jump to dodge them.

The more you travel around the world, the more you make the better score.

But pay attention, sometimes the world can change.

Gameplay:

Jump to start the game.
Then jump again, and the little traveler will jump like you.

Requirement:

A webcam or another virtual webcam (eg droidcam throught Android device) is mandatory

Interfaces:

to switch between multiple cameras, if any to quit the game

Developer team:

Fossa team composed by Kanto and Tolotra

Enjoy
